channel.title: Released MMOnline + Tutorial
channel.description:
Posted Here and on google
[size=18pt][b]Multiple Virus Scans: http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=bd392dfce8c1252400993c84875dce51cda50d6f0ac188f8dbea2ea0e3e12676-1282015374[/b][/size]
Well another one of my projects has come and gone, now I am going to release the fully coded MMOnline (MegaMan Online) game.
First for some vids to spike your intrest:
[B]Trailer[/B]: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VMbdQZGgSo]YouTube - MMOnline - New BETA MMORPG![/url]
[B]Gameplay[/B]: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KAsWpMpMVZ4]YouTube - MMOnline GamePlay[/url]
Like I said the game is completely coded and finished. There are tons of features including hundreds of quests, MegaMan customization, new chip assets, a cross system, beasting out, and so much more!
[B]Tutorial[/B]: Open the Client. Go to [B]Options[/B] then the [B]Emulator[/B] sublink and make sure that [B]PAUSE WHEN INACTIVE WINDOW[/B] is [B]UNCHECKED[/B] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/pause.jpg[/img]
Next go to [B]Options[/B], and go to the last sublink named [B]Link[/B] and make sure [B]Wireless Adapter[/B] is [B]CHECKED[/B] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/wa.jpg[/img]
[B]Turn Hamachi ON and make sure your friends are connected (you may use No-IP if you wish I believe.)[/B]
Back on the client press [B]Ctrl+M[/B] and a window like this should popup [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/win.jpg[/img]
Be sure that [B]Network[/B] is selected like the pic above
Go to the [B]Server Tab[/B] and click [B]Start[/B] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/tcp.jpg[/img]
Once you click start this should come up stating that you are waiting for players [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/waiting.jpg[/img]
Tell your friends to go to the [B]Client Tab[/B] and to type in your [B]Hamachi IpAddress[/B] and click [B]Connect[/B] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/vba/connect.jpg[/img]
Once they have all connected on the client go to [B]File[/B], [B]Open[/B], and open the [B]Game File[/B].
Once you are ingame simply press start go down to Comm, Select [b]WRLS ADPT[/b] and select [b]HS (your friends choose CL)[/b]
Well thats it, more games are soon to come. Have fun with your own MegaMan Battle Network 6 Online Game!
[B]GAME CONTROLS:
Z=a X=b A=L S=R Backspace=Select Enter=Start Spacebar=Fastforward[/B]
Be sure to post any questions you have!
DOWNLOADS: [B]Client[/B]: [url=http://uppit.com/h5z33tb0c0no/Game-Client.rar]http://uppit.com/h5z33tb0c0no/Game-Client.rar[/url]
[B]Game File Gregar[/B]: [url=http://uppit.com/x07ko8171rg7/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Gregar.zip]http://uppit.com/x07ko8171rg7/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Gregar.zip[/url]
[B]Game File Falzar[/B]: [url=http://uppit.com/zsg7fz9lt96e/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Falzar.zip]http://uppit.com/zsg7fz9lt96e/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Falzar.zip[/url]
[B]Game Content Falzar/Gregar - This is your choice. Choose whichever side you think that you would like best. DO NOT EXTRACT THE GAME CONTENT FOR RISK OF FILE CORRUPTION! [/B]
[B]Virus Scan[/B]: [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/scan.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/scan1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Released MMOnline + Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @G-Maker G-Maker
item.description:
@G-Maker wrote:

Posted Here and on google

[size=18pt]Multiple Virus Scans: http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=bd392dfce8c1252400993c84875dce51cda50d6f0ac188f8dbea2ea0e3e12676-1282015374[/size]

Well another one of my projects has come and gone, now I am going to release the fully coded MMOnline (MegaMan Online) game.

First for some vids to spike your intrest:

Trailer:
YouTube - MMOnline - New BETA MMORPG!

Gameplay:
YouTube - MMOnline GamePlay

Like I said the game is completely coded and finished. There are tons of features including hundreds of quests, MegaMan customization, new chip assets, a cross system, beasting out, and so much more!

Tutorial:
Open the Client. Go to Options then the Emulator sublink and make sure that PAUSE WHEN INACTIVE WINDOW is UNCHECKED

Next go to Options, and go to the last sublink named Link and make sure Wireless Adapter is CHECKED

Turn Hamachi ON and make sure your friends are connected (you may use No-IP if you wish I believe.)

Back on the client press Ctrl+M and a window like this should popup

Be sure that Network is selected like the pic above

Go to the Server Tab and click Start

Once you click start this should come up stating that you are waiting for players

Tell your friends to go to the Client Tab and to type in your Hamachi IpAddress and click Connect

Once they have all connected on the client go to File, Open, and open the Game File.

Once you are ingame simply press start go down to Comm, Select WRLS ADPT and select HS (your friends choose CL)

Well thats it, more games are soon to come. Have fun with your own MegaMan Battle Network 6 Online Game!

[B]GAME CONTROLS:

Z=a
X=b
A=L
S=R
Backspace=Select
Enter=Start
Spacebar=Fastforward[/B]

Be sure to post any questions you have!

DOWNLOADS:
Client: http://uppit.com/h5z33tb0c0no/Game-Client.rar

Game File Gregar: http://uppit.com/x07ko8171rg7/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Gregar.zip

Game File Falzar: http://uppit.com/zsg7fz9lt96e/Mega-Man_Battle_Network_6_-_Cybeast_Falzar.zip
